content: this month for our august 2022 scarf of the month crochet along i am sharing the pattern for my elegant crochet scarf the crochet stitch pattern is worked across an easy-to-remember four row repeat using pretty puff stitches half double crochets half_double_crochet double crochets double_crochet and single_crochet stitches single_crochet for this project i used king cole cotton top dk given to me by king cole this is a beautifully soft cotton and acrylic yarn blend i used a 4 mm g crochet hook for this project the gauge is measured using double_crochet stitches double_crochet the stitch multiple is 2+1 the matching hat pattern will be available next week elegant crochet hat direct link to pattern https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/elegant-crochet-scarf-pattern/ this pattern will be available as a free pdf download until august 22 2022 at 11 59 pm et for cal participants simply add the pattern to your cart before 11 59 pm est on august 22nd and it will show as $0 00 the free pattern will be available on my blog beginning on august 21 2022 at 7 00 pm est > this pattern is available for free on > my blog which is monetized by ads if > you prefer an ad-free version of the > pattern it is available to purchase > right here on ravelry ♥ rhondda **instagram ** https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ **instagram reels ** https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/reels/ **tiktok ** https //www tiktok com/@oombawkadesigncrochet **pinterest ** https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ **youtube ** https //www youtube
